author: {'steamid': '76561199003798970', 'num_games_owned': 1840, 'num_reviews': 310, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1612399207}
review: This frenzied action-platformer combines some of the best elements from Super Mario Bros., Super Meat Boy and Mega Man and bundles them up in an awesome little 3D package. Hours of pure fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111968405', 'num_games_owned': 2283, 'num_reviews': 209, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1664154099}
review:
Few words about the game;
If you like platformers you may like it it's challenging and there really are no ''good'' new platformers out there..
However game looks much better on trailer than it really is, character design and animations around him are okay, but everything else is just meh and below mediocre, you can see that time run over it since it was developed years back.
Also important note is that you are required to play it with controller because playing with keyboard is impossible due stupid controls.
Music is fun for first 5 minutes, after you realize that 30 second song keep looping it is starting to be annoying af.
All being written if you pay 20 bucks for this, something is seriously wrong with you. No it is not worth this money, in matter of fact it's a piss on community.

On the other hand, publisher behind this game is notorious Golden Bell Studios which have a quite history behind it.
I'll leave it up to you if you want to spend your precious life time to google it and convince yourself even more to stay away from this game.

So initial release should be something in 2015/16 I think, and someone asked if it was today back then because it was the date announced and I replied this  : https://prnt.sc/105int6
See what happend ?! :D 

Exactly! Stay the fuck away from this game, it's developer and publisher.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095011619', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1613939689}
review: El juego engancha un montón, tiene un control muy fluido. Plataformeo dinámico y bastante exigente. Aquellos que os molen los juegos rollo "super meat boy" lo váis a GOSAR.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041885850', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1626704522}
review:
I have to admit that I got really hooked on this.

Something reminds me what I felt the first time I played the original Crash Bandicoot saga. A really fresh, addictive recommendable game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198050248229', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1614630194}
review:
Frenetismo por un tubo! 

En cuanto a lo jugable, , me ha parecido bastante bueno, a parte del obvio frenetismo presente en todo el juego que se  consigue con elementos como la barra de energía que se vacía a cada segundo, los enemigos que van y vienen sin parar, y los niveles del tsunami, se encuentran distintas dinámicas a lo largo del juego que rompen la monotonía que se pudiera dar en los distintos niveles. 

Me ha gustado mucho el apartado visual, tiene un arte 3D muy vistoso y colorido, con unas ambientaciones bastante chulas, por no hablar de los temas musicales que te acompañan durante todo el juego que le sientan como anillo al dedo al juego. 

Si te gustan los juegos de plataformas  que te supongan todo un reto para ti este es tu juego.
